content:
🧩 NEW: Large Print Sudoku Puzzles for Seniors! 

My grandmother struggled with regular puzzles - the numbers were too small. So I created these specifically for seniors with large, easy-to-read numbers.

🎯 Perfect for brain training
👁️ Large print for aging eyes
🧠 Improves memory and focus

Only $2.99 for 100 puzzles! 

Link in comments 👇

I created large print Sudoku puzzles for my grandmother - would anyone else be interested?

My grandmother loves Sudoku but regular puzzles are too hard to read. I made a collection of 100 large print puzzles specifically designed for seniors.

- Large, easy-to-read numbers
- Perfect difficulty level for seniors
- Improves memory and cognitive function
- Printable PDF format

I'm thinking of selling them for $2.99. Would anyone be interested in something like this?

🧩 Just launched: Large Print Sudoku Puzzles for Seniors!

👁️ Easy-to-read numbers
🧠 Brain training benefits
🎯 Perfect difficulty level

Only $2.99 for 100 puzzles!

Perfect gift for parents/grandparents who love puzzles but struggle with small print.

#Sudoku #BrainTraining #Seniors #LargePrint
